turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi. I'd like to order some pizzas from Bella Luna's pizzeria, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like to order two pizzas, both of them large and both of them with extra cheese. One pizza, can I get a barbecue chicken pizza.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: And the second pizza, can I get a macaroni and cheese pizza?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, you are ordering 2 large pizzas with extra cheese, 1 bbq chicken and 1 mac and cheese pizza, is that correct?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, your total will be $50, is that ok?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: would you like to dine in, pick up, or have your order delivered?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, your pizzas will be ready in 35 minutes and your receipt will be texted to you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help with anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, that's about it. Thank you very much.
